items.sentence: Tom's house wasn't as large as I thought it would be.
Tom spent all afternoon on the porch, reading a book.
I wonder how Tom managed to get that done so quickly.
More than 40 percent of students go on to university.
Tom wasn't sure whether he wanted Mary to stay or go.
Tom believes that he has a very low carbon footprint.
What made you believe that Tom was telling the truth?
Tom already knows Mary will be at his birthday party.
Let's go back to that restaurant we ate at last week.
I thought that you said you weren't afraid of ghosts.
